Analytics Logic Guide

Understanding how SupperBOT evaluates your community

How It Works

SupperBOT Analytics processes real-time events from your server to generate actionable insights. Data is collected continuously and aggregated into weekly snapshots every Monday at 00:00 UTC.

Message Activity
Member Growth
XP & Leveling

Server Health Score

A 0-100 metric calculated from three key pillars:

40%

Activity Rate

Messages per member ratio. High scores require consistent daily conversations relative to server size.

30%

Engagement Depth

Percentage of "Active" members vs "Inactive". Measures how many people actually participate.

30%

Growth & Retention

New member joins minus leaves. Positive growth boosts this score significantly.

0-39 Low
40-69 Fair
70-89 Good
90+ Elite

Engagement Tiers

Members are categorized based on their weekly activity intensity:

üèÜ

Elite (Top 5%)

The core pillars of your community. They drive conversations and have the highest XP gain.

‚ö°

Active (20%)

Regular participants who contribute frequently but aren't online 24/7.

üë§

Casual (50%)

Lurkers or occasional posters. They read more than they write.

üí§

Inactive (25%)

Members with zero activity in the last 7 days.

Data & Privacy

  • Only message counts and timestamps are stored.
  • Message content is never saved.
  • Individual user stats are public on the leaderboard.
  • Snapshots are retained for historical comparison.

Additional Options

XP Reset Options

Configure how XP resets work on your server

Manually reset all XP and remove role rewards

Manually reset all XP but keep role rewards

Automatically reset XP and remove roles every X days

Automatically reset XP but keep roles every X days

Auto-Reset Active

Created On

-

Next Reset

-

Auto-Reset Behavior: Auto-resets are recurring - they will repeat every X days until you disable them.

Important: Only ONE auto-reset option can be active at a time. If you enable "Auto Reset (Remove Roles)", it will take priority over "Auto Reset (Keep Roles)". To use "Keep Roles", make sure "Remove Roles" is turned OFF.

General Settings

Configure XP rates and general bot behavior for your server.

XP Per Message

Points awarded for each message sent

XP Per Image

Bonus points for posting images

XP Per Minute in Voice

Points earned for voice channel activity

Daily Voice XP Limit

Maximum voice XP per day (0 = unlimited)

XP Cooldown

Time between XP gains (prevents spam)

Analytics & Weekly Reports

Configure automated analytics reports and weekly stats reset timing

Receive automated analytics reports via Discord DM every week

Reports are sent every Monday at 9:00 AM in this timezone

Weekly message and member counters reset every Monday at 12:00 AM (midnight) in this timezone.

Time Channels

Create voice channels that display live time in different timezones.

Time channels update every 10 minutes

How it works

  • The bot creates locked voice channels with the current time
  • Channel names update every 10 minutes to show current time
  • Perfect for international communities

Commands - Supporter Bot {% include 'partials/navbar.html' %}
üìö Command Reference

Complete Command List

Browse all available commands organized by category. Click any command to copy it to your clipboard.

General Commands

Basic bot information and server configuration

/b1-ping

Check bot latency and response time

Leveling System

XP tracking, ranks, and leaderboards

/l1-level

Check your current level, XP, and rank

user (optional) - Check another user's level
/l2-leaderboard

Display the top 10 users by XP in the server

/l3-setup-level-reward

Configure automatic role rewards for reaching specific levels

level - Level threshold role - Role to assign
/l4-remove-level-reward

Remove a configured level reward

level - Level to remove reward from
/l5-notify-level-msg

Set the channel for level-up notifications

/l6-xp-settings

Configure XP rates for messages, images, and voice activity

/l7-level-config

Configure system behavior (message style, role stacking, etc)

Analytics

Server health metrics and engagement tracking

/a1-dashboard

View your server's analytics dashboard

/a2-history

View past weekly analytics reports

/a3-generate-snapshot

Generate an on-demand analytics snapshot

YouTube Notifications

Monitor YouTube channels for new uploads

/y1-find-youtube-channel-id

Extract YouTube channel ID from a channel URL

url - YouTube channel URL
/y2-setup-youtube-notifications

Enable YouTube notifications for a channel

channel_id - YouTube channel ID discord_channel - Where to post notifications message (optional) - Custom notification message
/y3-remove-youtube-notifications

Disable YouTube notifications for a channel

channel_id - YouTube channel ID to remove
/y4-list-youtube-notifications

List all monitored YouTube channels for this server

/y5-test-rss-feed

Test RSS feed for a YouTube channel

Time & Clocks

Dynamic timezone clocks and time channels

/t1-setup-clock

Create a timezone clock channel

timezone - IANA timezone (e.g., America/New_York) format - Time or Date format
/t2-list-clocks

List all configured time channels

/t3-remove-clock

Remove a time channel configuration

channel - Channel to remove

Channel Restrictions

Control what content is allowed in channels

/n1-setup-no-text

Configure a channel to only allow media (images, videos, files)

/n2-remove-restriction

Remove all restrictions from a channel

/n3-bypass-no-text

Add a role that can bypass all channel restrictions

/n4-show-bypass-roles

Show all roles that can bypass restrictions

/n5-remove-bypass-role

Remove a role from bypass list

/n6-no-discord-link

Block Discord invite links in a channel

/n7-no-links

Block all links in a channel

/n8-setup-text-only

Configure a channel to only allow plain text (no media)

/n9-immune-role

Add or remove an immune role for a specific channel restriction

Reminders & Time

Schedule reminders and manage timezones

/t1-set-timezone

Set the server's timezone for time-based features

timezone - Timezone (e.g., America/New_York)
/t2-current-time

Display the current time in the server's timezone

/r1-list

View all active reminders for this server

/r2-delete

View all active reminders for this server

/r3-delete-reminder

Delete a specific reminder

reminder_id - ID of the reminder to delete

Owner & Admin

Bot management and administrative tools

/o1-bot-info

Display bot statistics, uptime, and system information

Owner Only
/o2-set-presence

Change the bot's status and activity

status - online, idle, dnd, invisible activity (optional) - Custom activity text
Owner Only
/o3-server-list

List all servers the bot is currently in

Owner Only

Quick Reference

Need Help?

Use /h1-help in Discord for interactive help

Web Dashboard

Manage settings easily at /dashboard

Visit /features for detailed guides

Why Use the Dashboard?

Everything you need to manage your server, accessible from any device with a modern interface.

No Commands Required

Configure everything with intuitive point-and-click controls. No need to memorize complex command syntax.

Real-Time Analytics

View server statistics, member growth, and engagement metrics updated in real-time.

Mobile Friendly

Manage your server from anywhere - desktop, tablet, or mobile. Fully responsive design.

Advanced Controls

Fine-tune every feature with granular settings and customization options.

Instant Updates

Changes take effect immediately. No waiting, no delays - configure and see results instantly.

Secure & Safe

OAuth2 authentication with Discord. Your data is encrypted and secure at all times.

What You Can Manage

Full control over all bot features from one centralized dashboard

Leveling System

Configure XP rates, level rewards, and leaderboard settings

YouTube Notifications

Add/remove channels, customize notification messages

Channel Restrictions

Set up media-only or text-only channels with exemptions

Reminders & Time

Create recurring reminders and set server timezone

Member Management

View member stats, activity, and engagement metrics

Server Settings

Configure general bot settings and preferences

How It Works

Get started in just 3 simple steps

1

Login with Discord

Click the "Login with Discord" button and authorize the dashboard to access your server list.

2

Select Your Server

Choose which server you want to manage. You'll see all servers where you have admin permissions.

3

Configure & Manage

Access all features, view analytics, and customize settings with an easy-to-use interface.

Features - Supporter Bot {% include 'partials/navbar.html' %}
‚ú® Powerful Features

Everything You Need
to Manage Your Server

Discover the comprehensive suite of tools designed to elevate your Discord community experience.

Advanced Leveling System

Engage your community with XP tracking and rewards

Our sophisticated leveling system tracks user activity and rewards engagement with XP points. Members gain experience through messages, voice chat participation, and server interactions. Set up automatic role rewards at specific levels to incentivize participation.

XP Tracking

Automatic experience points for messages and voice activity

Leaderboards

Real-time rankings showing top contributors

Role Rewards

Automatic role assignment when users reach milestones

Customizable

Configure XP rates, cooldowns, and reward thresholds

YouTube Notifications

Never miss a video upload from your favorite creators

Stay connected with content creators by receiving notifications (checked every 15 mins) when they upload new videos. Perfect for gaming communities, fan servers, or any group following YouTube channels. Customize notification messages and choose which channels to monitor.

Real-Time Alerts

Notifications checked every 15 minutes whenever new videos are published

Easy Setup

Simple channel ID detection from YouTube URLs

Custom Messages

Personalize notification text and mentions

Multi-Channel

Monitor multiple YouTube channels simultaneously

Analytics Dashboard

Track server health and engagement metrics

Monitor your server's growth and engagement with comprehensive analytics. Track member activity, message trends, and server health scores. Get weekly automated reports and generate snapshots on-demand to understand your community better.

Health Score

Real-time server health metrics and engagement tracking

Growth Trends

Visualize member growth and activity patterns

Weekly Reports

Automated weekly analytics reports sent to server owner

Snapshots

Generate on-demand analytics snapshots anytime

Dynamic Time Channels

Display live time in any timezone

Create voice channels that automatically update to show the current time and date in any timezone. Perfect for global communities, the channel names update every 10 minutes to display accurate time information. Support for custom formats and multiple timezones.

Auto-Updating

Channel names update every 10 minutes automatically

Any Timezone

Support for all IANA timezones worldwide

Date & Time

Display both date and time in customizable formats

Multiple Clocks

Create multiple time channels for different timezones

Granular Channel Restrictions

Fine-tuned content control for your channels

Maintain channel organization with powerful content filtering. Set channels to media-only, text-only, or create custom restrictions using our granular content type system. Automatically delete non-compliant messages while optionally notifying users.

Media-Only Mode

Allow only images, videos, and attachments

Text-Only Mode

Restrict channels to text messages only

Granular Control

Mix and match allowed content types with bitwise flags

Role Exemptions

Bypass restrictions for specific roles

Smart Reminders & Timezone Support

Never forget important events again

Create recurring reminders with full timezone support. Perfect for scheduled events, meetings, or regular announcements. Set one-time or repeating reminders with customizable intervals and automatic timezone conversion.

Recurring Reminders

Daily, weekly, or custom interval reminders

Timezone Aware

Automatic conversion to server and user timezones

Event Scheduling

Schedule messages for future dates and times

Smart Mentions

Mention specific users or roles in reminders

Comprehensive Server Management

Full control through an intuitive dashboard

Manage all bot features through our modern web dashboard. Configure settings, view analytics, and monitor server activity from any device. No need to remember complex commands - everything is just a click away.

Web Dashboard

Beautiful, responsive interface for all settings

Analytics

Track server growth and engagement metrics

Secure OAuth

Login safely with Discord authentication

Mobile Friendly

Manage your server from any device

Owner & Admin Tools

Powerful utilities for server administrators

Advanced tools reserved for server owners and administrators. Manage bot presence, view system statistics, and access diagnostic information. Perfect for troubleshooting and optimizing bot performance.

System Info

View bot uptime, latency, and resource usage

Presence Control

Customize bot status and activity

Database Stats

Monitor database connections and queries

Diagnostics

Debug tools and error logging

Privacy Policy

Last Updated: December 2025

1. Information We Collect

To provide our services, SupporterBOT collects and stores the following limited data:

  • User ID & Username: To identify you across servers and for the leveling system.
  • Server ID & Configuration: Custom settings, prefixes, and channel configurations.
  • Leveling Data: XP, rank, and level progression within servers.
  • YouTube Configuration: Channel IDs you wish to track for notifications.
  • Analytics Data: Server statistics, engagement metrics, and growth trends for generating health reports.
  • Timezone Preferences: Timezone settings for accurate time display in clock channels and scheduled reports.

2. How We Use Your Data

Your data is used solely for the functionality of the bot:

  • To display global and server-specific leaderboards.
  • To send notifications when a tracked YouTube channel uploads new content.
  • To enforce channel restrictions and reminders as configured by server admins.
  • To generate server health reports and analytics dashboards showing engagement trends.
  • To display accurate time in timezone-specific clock channels and schedule weekly reports.

3. Data Storage & Security

All data is stored securely in our databases. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties. Access to the database is strictly limited to the bot's developers for maintenance purposes.

Data Retention: Analytics snapshots are stored for historical comparison and trend analysis. Weekly reports are retained for 90 days. You can request deletion of your server's analytics data at any time.

4. Third-Party Services

SupporterBOT uses the YouTube Data API to fetch video information. By using the YouTube notification feature, you also agree to be bound by the YouTube Terms of Service and Google Privacy Policy.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to request the deletion of your data. You can do this by:

  • Removing the bot from your server (some configuration data may persist for a short period).
  • Contacting us directly via our Support Server to request a full data wipe associated with your User ID.

Terms of Service

Last Updated: December 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By inviting SupporterBOT to your Discord server or using its features (including Dashboard, Leveling, Analytics, Time Channels, YouTube Alerts, or Channel Restrictions), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.

2. Usage License

We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use SupporterBOT for your Discord server management needs, subject to the following restrictions:

  • You may not use the bot for any illegal purposes or to violate Discord's Terms of Service.
  • You may not attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, or exploit the bot's code or API.
  • Spamming bot commands or intentionally causing lag/crashes is strictly prohibited.
  • Analytics data must not be used to harass, target, or discriminate against server members.
  • Time channels must display accurate information and not be used for spam or misleading content.

3. Service Availability

While we strive for 99.9% uptime, we do not guarantee uninterrupted access to SupporterBOT. Features may be modified, updated, or removed at any time without prior notice for maintenance or improvements.

Service Schedules: Analytics reports are generated weekly and on-demand via slash commands. Time channels update every 10 minutes to reflect current time in configured timezones. YouTube notifications are checked every 15 minutes.

4. User Responsibilities

Server administrators are responsible for the configuration of the bot within their servers. We are not liable for data loss or unintended consequences resulting from improper configuration (e.g., deleted channels via management tools).

5. Termination

We reserve the right to ban any user or server from using SupporterBOT if they are found to be in violation of these terms or Discord's Community Guidelines.

6. Contact

For questions regarding these terms, please join our Support Server.
